                            java.lang.String toWhere,
                            java.lang.String actionAmount,
                            java.lang.String transactionLogDirectory,
                            java.lang.String bankUserCSVInput,
                            java.lang.String bankUserCSVOutput)
        Method for the Customer to transfer money from an account to another account
        Parameters:
        customer - : The customer that wants to transfer money from different accounts
        fromWhere - : the account to transfer from
        toWhere - : the account to transfer to
        actionAmount - : amount to transfer
        transactionLogDirectory - : directory to log this action to
        bankUserCSVInput - : Input CSV to change
        bankUserCSVOutput - : Output CSV that is changed

      • transactionReader

        public static void transactionReader​(java.lang.String firstName,
                                     java.lang.String lastName,
                                     java.lang.String fromWhere,
                                     java.lang.String action,
                                     java.lang.String toFirstName,
                                     java.lang.String toLastName,
                                     java.lang.String toWhere,
                                     java.lang.String actionAmount,
                                     java.util.List<Customer> customerList)
        Reads A Transaction Action
        Parameters:
        firstName - : Sender first name
        lastName - : Sender last name
        fromWhere - : Which account from the sender
        action - : what action to execute
        toFirstName - : Receiver first name
        toLastName - : Receiver Last name
        toWhere - : which account from the receiver
        actionAmount - : amount for the action
        customerList - : the list of customers to find the Sender and the receiver
